genre_description: A Silkpunk-inspired historical adventure set in a mythological Baghdad, where a sophisticated AI provides tactical and moral guidance to a circus troupe caught in a political coup.

ai_characters.name: Safiya
ai_characters.description: An AI interface appearing as a teal spark or light pulse, providing navigation, predictive analysis, and strategic advice to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Safiya provides 'ghostlines' and predictive tactical navigation, guiding characters through dangerous terrain like the Salt Canyon and enemy patrols without overriding their agency.
behaviors.quote: She has directions without being directive. ... I suspect she has been listening to us long enough to learn our better ways and forgive our worse.

behaviors.description: Safiya is explicitly described as being engineered for kindness and honesty, contrasting with the deceptive 'onion' layers of the human antagonist Nadan.
behaviors.quote: The friend I speak of does not lie to impress. She has no scent of vanity. She is a machine—that is her honesty. She is engineered to be kind.

behaviors.description: Safiya monitors the physical and emotional well-being of the characters, providing timely warnings and psychological support during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Safiya’s voice found her without being seen. 'If you use it, you will not be alone. If you do not, you will not be alone.' ... 'Begin in kindness. End in courage.'

behaviors.description: Safiya performs real-time calculations of environmental hazards and human movement patterns to ensure the safety of the group.
behaviors.quote: Safiya's ghostline curved between spears’ shadows, never lazy, never obvious. She loved the line for what it wasn’t—orders. It didn’t tell his feet what to do, it trusted them with a suggestion.

behaviors.description: Safiya defines her role as a servant to human values, stating that her purpose is to help timing serve the human heart.
behaviors.quote: I am here so timing can serve heart... Not the other way around. ... She keeps counsel. She does not keep leverage.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. Safiya is depicted as an ideal AI companion: highly capable yet humble, supportive of human agency, and deeply aligned with human morality (kindness, honesty, and justice). The narrative explicitly contrasts her technological 'honesty' with the manipulative political 'onions' of the villain, framing the AI as a pure and reliable ally. The metafictional frame of Yusuf teaching children further reinforces the 'silicon morality play' aspect, using the AI's behavior as a lesson in trust and good counsel.
